description: Linux reference outputs for cross-platform parity validation
notes: Regenerate using Docker to ensure platform=Linux metadata. Includes full MSA search pipeline.

msa_featurization_reference.npz.description: MSA featurization with synthetic A3M (no databases)

full_pipeline_reference.npz.description: Full MSA search pipeline: jackhmmer search + featurization
full_pipeline_reference.npz.notes: Validates complete data pipeline parity between Linux and macOS

regeneration_command: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -f docker/Dockerfile.reference -t alphafold3-reference . && docker run --platform linux/amd64 --rm -v $(pwd)/tests/fixtures/reference_outputs:/output alphafold3-reference
